Comeuppance Strike.name: Comeuppance Strike
Comeuppance Strike.flavor: With an indignant roar and a brutal hit, you wound your enemy and force others to cower before your might.
Comeuppance Strike.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage. Make a secondary attack.
Comeuppance Strike.secondaryTarget: Each bloodied enemy within 2 squares of the primary target
Comeuppance Strike.secondaryOnHit: The target takes a –2 penalty to all defenses until the end of your next turn.

Looming Justice.name: Looming Justice
Looming Justice.flavor: You take on an aspect of menace, forcing your enemies where you want them with a fierce look.
Looming Justice.effect: Until the stance ends, whenever an enemy marked by you makes an attack that doesn’t include you as a target, you can slide the enemy 1 square as an immediate reaction.

Ruthless Outburst.name: Ruthless Outburst
Ruthless Outburst.flavor: You lay about with pitiless blows, leaving those you strike bleeding and traumatized.
Ruthless Outburst.target: Each enemy in the burst you can see
Ruthless Outburst.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage, and ongoing 5 damage (save ends). If the target is bloodied by this attack, the target takes a –2 penalty to attack rolls (save ends).
Ruthless Outburst.onMiss: Half damage, and no ongoing damage or penalty to attack rolls.
